title: The instructions of structural engineer structural design, safety & execution of work are binding on owner/ developer & professionals on record including contractor engaged for the work
clause_text: The instructions of structural engineer structural design, safety & execution of work are binding on owner/ developer & professionals on record including contractor engaged for the work. The noncompliance of the instructions of the structural engineer shall be intimated to Commissioner.
section: Structural Safety for Protection of Buildings against Natural Hazard:
